```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)

source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))

imperv <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)
prediction <- predict_runoff(imperv, 182)

prediction_frame <- data.frame(prediction, imperv)

runoff_plot <- ggplot(data = prediction_frame, aes(x = imperv, y = prediction)) +
  geom_point() + geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Water Shed Runofff",
       ylab = "Volume of Runoff (ft^3)",
       xlab = "Fraction of Watershed Impervious to Water")

ggsave(here::here("figs", "runoff_plot.png"), width = 5, height = 6)
```
